name: Go: Tracing HTTP requests
summary:
The HTTP protocol is fast, secure, and reliable. However, it needs other protocols and services to work properly, and when things donâ€™t go well it is necessary to have access to detailed information about the time spent in each step.
The steps to make an HTTP call are as follows:
 DNS Lookup  The client sends a DNS query to the DNS server. The DNS server responds with the IP for the name.
